website_summaries.verdict: Simple design for a boot dryer that is easy to carry anywhere with a small size.
pros: Makes use of thermal convection, so it can run noiselessly without relying on a motor to move the air
Doesn't take up much floor space with a portable design
Long tubes allow it to work with tall boots effectively
Has good balance to ensure it won't tip over
cons: Longevity of the unit is uncertain

customer_reviews.title: No fan, just warm air wafting upwards into the boots to dry them...  Still need some really-wet boots!
customer_reviews.text: Now I need some really wet boots to really test it out. This model does not have a fan - so there is no forced/moving air. It relies on a little heater in the base unit, the allows that heated air to waft upwards into the boot. I put some kinda-sweaty/moist leather Justin boots on to dry. A couple hours later, they were "dry-er". But not as dry as expected. Maybe this is an overnight kinda thing...?
customer_reviews.author: jon mceachron

customer_reviews.title: YES! I just LOVE my Hunny's new ' Boot ' Warmer.......😘
customer_reviews.text: Best. SOCK..., I mean, " BOOT " dryer, EVER. Yes it is hunting season. Yes I did buy these for my husband's waders and Boots. Have I used it for his boots and waders, not a chance! I have used these every night to warm my fresh cute pair of socks that I wear to bed, because somehow for me, settling in with warm comfy soft socks..... helps me sleep so much better. On a much softer note I will probably be buying a second one, for the aforementioned husband's disgusting hunting boots and waders.😇 HE'S NOT GETTING THIS ONE...... I honestly don't think he even knows it arrived, it's so quiet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly Morlan

customer_reviews.title: Makes my boots feel like new every morning.
customer_reviews.text: I love the boot dryer. I walk my dog every morning in my Ugg boots and even though I've waterproofed them they get very wet. This dries them out very nice and makes them feel like brand new. I wish it had a timer as I do not like to have to remember to unplug it. I see they have a model with a timer but it looks bigger and I didn't want something too big. This is actually smaller than I thought it would be, and I am glad, as I don't want it to take up a lot of space. It is plenty big enough to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Silent dryer!
customer_reviews.text: The product is much bigger than I thought, but it does the job perfectly. It drys slightly wet boots within 3-4 hours. It’s going to take about 8-9 hours to dry up totally wet boots, which is fine if you have an option to use it overnight. It’s completely SILENT. I’ve never heard any noises. The only issue I can point on so far is lack of on/off button. It’s a bit uncomfortable to plug it in and out every time. Other than that the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Igor K.

customer_reviews.title: This dryer does not blow air, it has a ...
customer_reviews.text: This dryer does not blow air, it has a heating element that gives off radiant heat. The dryer takes forever to dry anything you put on it.
customer_reviews.author: C Garrard

customer_reviews.title: Dries sweaty boots nicely!
customer_reviews.text: I wear two sets of high top boots and work on hard concrete all day, in a hot, humid shop. My boots spend a day on this dryer, then worn a day. This works magnificently. Also does a great job helping eliminate pesky athletes foot by helping kill it off from inside the boot. I recommend keeping a spray bottle of straight household vinegar next to it. Spritz the inside of the boots, let it soak in a little, and drop it on this dryer. This helps kill off the fungus. I also spray my feet with it, but if its really itchy, you better grab the altar by the horns before you spray them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of going to work every day in cold wet boots and having cold wet feet. Takes about 4 hours for boot dryer to dry my boots. But work boots are big and heavy. Machine seems a little undersized and under built for my size 12's. So long as I am careful getting boots on and off, I think it will be just fine, but I think I have to be careful. But the price is right. Other boot dryers run twice as much. For the price, these are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dogface

customer_reviews.title: You'll have wet boots if you buy this product!!
customer_reviews.text: A Job site boot dryer? This is NOT any job site boot dryer! It couldn't even remotely dry my husbands Redwing boots after being on the dryer all night!! As a matter of fact it didn't even dry my grandaughtera boots and we got this boot dryer just byyesrerday. Don't waist your money on this product. I went against my better judgement. I should have gotten the dry guys boot dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee (Wierman) Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiance's work boots. They are constantly wet and began to stink. He uses this every night to dry his boots and they don't smell anymore and his feet are more comfortable during the day. It is silent and it doesn't stink up the room to have hot boots on it like I thought it would. It's a nice bonus to put on warm shoes on cold winter mornings as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool; needs a switch.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tool. It dries wet boots or shoes overnight. It is very quiet, not dangerously hot, lightweight and easy to store. It is autumn here and I just keep it near our shoe rack. This version has an ON light, which is an improvement over others, but it lacks an ON switch, has to be plugged in every time. I added an inexpensive cord switch from Home Depot which saves me the effort to get to the wall outlet. I think the manufacturer could add a switch for pennies; can't understand why it is built without one.
customer_reviews.author: OldDancer

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 of these 1 at the office and 1 at home.  A MUST for boxers and MMA people.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these 1 at the office and 1 at home. 1 at the office is for my boxing gloves after I train. Keeps them dry and keeps out the stink. A MUST for anyone that boxes or does MMA!!!! 1 at home is for my teenage sons stinky basketball shoes. Again as long as my son put them on the heater it keeps his shoes dry and from smelling bad.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Really works great! Plus they are nice and warm in the morning. I work 8-12 hours a day 5-7 days a week in steel toes that get virtually soaked everyday, and they are dry and ready every morning. I was very sceptical, but they smell as good as the day I bought them. Don't think they would bring back an old pair of boots, but has been keeping my new ones fresh and dry for over a month now!
customer_reviews.author: MechanicManiac

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My husband works long hours and rarely has toe to let his boots dry completely before he has to return to work. This boot dryer has been a life saver. He loves putting warm dry boots on in the morning. He had many problems with his feet from wearing damp boots, and they've all resolved since using this dryer. It's a must have for anyone who finds that their shoes don't have sufficient time to dry before needing to be worn again.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: but after using it on my gloves it turns out that it works quite good. There are no fans so it relies on ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for boxing gloves. When I first plugged it in I was skeptical about it's drying capabilities, but after using it on my gloves it turns out that it works quite good. There are no fans so it relies on hot air rising through the tubes. I measure the temperature of inside the gloves after a few hours and its about 120-130F so not really hot enough to damage the materials.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boot, Shoe, Glove Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This works VERY well drying boots, shoes, and gloves. It make NO sound while drying. You don't even know it is on, but leave your boots on there over night and you will wake up to warm DRY boots. The power is controlled by the power cord and NOT an actual switch, so do NOT leave it plugged in when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: MotoXCop

customer_reviews.title: If you have work boots or riding boots, you need this
customer_reviews.text: I ride motorcycles in the rain and work in a wet environment. This has paid for itself already. It's useful after I oil my boots to get the oil to permeate into the leather. If you do anything where your footwear gets wet, you need this. I will be using this on my running shoes in the rainy season, also.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Keeton

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while...but works
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a complete waste of money... then it turns out it was drying the shoes. If they’re soaked and it’s freezing outside, don’t set it up on your covered porch. It’ll take forever... I don’t know how long...days. But soaked shoes dry in 24 hours in our garage.
customer_reviews.author: AshevilleChicken

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and great shoe warmer.
customer_reviews.text: I like this warmer, it's quiet and warms nicely and has an on/off switch. I didn't like that it took 10 days for it to ship, which made it later than the expected arrival date that they put. They shipped it 1 day before it was to arrive, so it was 2 days late. I do like the warmer though. A+ for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for HEAVY boots!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He wears heavy duty, steel-toe boots and this holds up great. Works great, dries well, holds his massive boots. I was worried about how it would hold up to his boots and it’s fine. Some reviews worried me but it’s been holding up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: We love this boot drier.
customer_reviews.text: Is come a staple in the house, we use it on a weekly basis, especially for the kids shoes/boots. Typically dries any shoe/boot within 24 hours, sometimes in less than 12 hours. Very quiet, no noise at all, no need to worry about heat either, does not get hot at all.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is incredible. I use it every night to dry out my workboots and by the morning, they are completely dry and warm with ZERO smell left. It is incredible how well it works. It is also completely silent because it uses a natural draft to circulate the air.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Draper

customer_reviews.title: Dries well - needs automatic off
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and dries shoes pretty quickly. Probably works better if used every single time. Once that wet soccer shoe smell settles in shoes, nothing can really be done. Sort of makes the room smell like the shoes. Wish it had an automatic shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Shoeshopper24

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it says it does it dries your boots. It will take all night to draw your boots but normally when you get off of work with wet boots or get out of the field from hunting with wet boots you’re not gonna need them again until the following morning so I believe this product does exactly what it says it does and I would recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Family thought over using mine so I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using one of these for more than a year-and-a-half and it has been perfect and its operation! I bought the second one because everyone wanted to take my boots off and use it to dry their shoes or my son's soccer cleats. They both operate silently and perfectly. The new model does have a small blue LED light to show that it's plugged in and on oh, which was a nice touch. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lathspell

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dogs twice a day in all weather. Either rain or morning dew leave my shoes wet. I also am a regular Habitat for Humanity volunteer and end up with muddy boots. This is an excellent tool for drying my shoes and boots. It does need and on/off switch when its not needed. It is silent.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Koch

customer_reviews.title: great dryer
customer_reviews.text: I dry both my boots and gloves with this dryer, great value for the money , does not "overdry" my boots Well, 2 years later I am adding to my review of this dryer. Its GREAT!!! drys my wet boots, gloves overnight no problem, If you want a boot dryer, get this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kalhoon58

customer_reviews.title: Warm and toasty toes
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate this for how it fit... I use it to dry my motorcross boots and it works great. It is quiet and gets the job done better than letting the boots sit out in the sun to dry (which could take days vs overnight with this!). Lookinf forward to drying my winter gear (gloves and boots) on this for the coming winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: My son has a pressure washing job for the summer and comes home with wet boots daily. The boots don’t leak but the spray runs into the boots. Before getting this dryer, we were using multiple fans and still not dry by morning. Very pleasantly surprised. Good product so far; 2 weeks in of 5 nights weekly use. 5-STARS
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Practicle Christmas Gift for Hunter
customer_reviews.text: My grandson gets up really early and spends the whole day out in the woods and snow. By the time he gets home his feet are cold and wet (even though, his boots are water proof) Now he comes home takes off his boots, puts them on this dryer and when he gets up in the morning he has dry boots to put on and they don't smell mildewed. Another Best Ever gift for one of my grandsons.
customer_reviews.author: Eve S.

customer_reviews.title: Toast warm and super quite
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Super quiet don’t even notice it’s running! I keep it plugged in all year around and every morning my boots are dry, and for the winter time nice and toasty to let the dog out or dust off the cars of snow! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold mornings
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift. The recipient says it works great as a warmer (the main purpose I thought he'd have for it). He puts his boots on it in the morning, and in 30 minutes when he's ready to go to the barn they are nice and warm. I may get one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S. in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I leave it in the garage running every night after work. I wake up to boots with no smell or mold. As a side bonus it's really nice on cold days to have pre warmed boots. 5am comes at you fast
customer_reviews.author: derek rima

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet happy.
customer_reviews.text: Been using almost a year now and I love it. I wear boots all day every day for work. Dry boots = fresh boots. No smelly feet problems or athletes foot. Nice in the winter to put warm boots on. Not too warm to be a problem in the summer. Just quiet(makes zero noise) steady heat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: The item does not work at all. It has a blue light which turns on but does not work at all to dry boots. Completely worthless. Had to give it at least one star to continue but would give it 0 stars in reality.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Clauer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this item to dry his work boots over night so they are warm and dry for the next day. It works great and his work boots are always perfectly dry for work.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Beckham

customer_reviews.title: great boot dryer
customer_reviews.text: Great boot dryer, it doesn't make a sound and gets my boots dry by the time I leave for work the next morning. You definitely need experiment with your boots and how long they need to dry for. Also there is a bit of a smell but that's just coming from the boots which isn't horrible. Overall works great and would recommend it to other working professionals
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: silent, perfect operation
customer_reviews.text: no noise dries soaked boots over nite. (provided you remove the insoles that trap water) nice warm boots in the morning lighted power switch to turn off when not using it
customer_reviews.author: Tina Rambo

customer_reviews.title: It works! No more stankfoot
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend had me buy these for his work boots. So I did. They work! No more stinky feet... hooray He's an electrician on his feet all day. This really helped
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Best money I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after a friend recommended me getting one. I found this particular product and what sold me on this one was the fact that it has a on/ off switch and you can try other things on it as well. I am super duper happy with this product! It is super quiet and easy to put together. I highly recommend the product! My boots are nice and warm every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dryer to dry large motorcross boots. The boots fit on the dryer stems but were too heavy for the hollow plastic stand to support. The "Toe" of the dryer stems usually come off of the dryer and end up inside the boot - a minor inconvenience. The main thing is that I got one good dry out of these boots before the electronics went dead. I still use the dryer to help air-dry my boots propped up against a wall until I can find a more industrial dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K.

customer_reviews.title: Silent and Dries My Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love that this boot dryer is silent, I can leave it running all night and it doesn’t make a sound. I’m a mail carrier and my shoes get soaked on rainy days and damp on normal days from dew. This works great for drying my shoes and keeps my shoes lasting longer. It’s well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet. Drys a bit slow (overnight for really wet boots) but it doesn't overheat so I don't worry about it being on all night. I do wish that it had an off on switch. You have to use the plug
customer_reviews.author: Fred7833

customer_reviews.title: Great for sports
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because my daughter is a volleyball player. It is used daily. Best purchase--wish would have bought one years ago. I recommended it to all the parents on her team. Much needed purchase and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: In the trash
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Doesn't help dry at all. Tossed it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: TDB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for drying and odor control
customer_reviews.text: They leave my shoes dry and odorless. I am very happy with my purchase. If your shoes are soaked, it might take 2 days for them to dry on this, but it's still amazing.
customer_reviews.author: MagicMom

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what was expected
customer_reviews.text: the reason it’s “silent heat” is because it’s a heating element with no protection that relies on the airflow of your room to carry heat all the way up the tubes to your boots, returning the product 2 days after i received it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Woods

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but I did open the box and everything looks nice. The product is very sturdy and it was easy to assemble. If I remember, I will come back and update my review base on my experience using it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Room doesn't smell anymore!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for family member with foot issues. They are EXTREMELY pleased with the results and the room doesn't need fumigation now.
customer_reviews.author: Northeast Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Works over night. Not overly hot. Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Haha. Not sure why it's asking how it fits. However, it works very well. Used them for some water logger motorcycle boots that had been sitting next to the fire for days and were still soaked. They nearly dry over night with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ortwein

customer_reviews.title: It’s an over night dryer (12-24hrs) if you have actually wet boots
customer_reviews.text: It works. I work outside all day, my boots are pretty wet at the end of the day. I pop them on my boot dryer and about 12-15 hours and there completely dry. It’s definitely an over the night dryer. Does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brownbear

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: This does nothing but heat up. When you place anything in the tubes nothing happens. There is NO air movement on this thing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: so far so good--I've used it once. it's all ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good--I've used it once. it's all plastic. so I'm hoping it is going to be durable. seems a little light. but I did use it to dry my son's boots; they were soaked! it took almost a whole day--but it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great my work boots always get wet inside because there is no air getting in but with this it dries them good and it gets rid of the smell very Silent it take about an hour or two to completely dry them
customer_reviews.author: Spiro’s

customer_reviews.title: This is ideal for anyone that comes home with soaked boots
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Dries boots evenly. Priced right. I use it almost every day. Great for warming up your shoes or boots prior to going out too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was hard to know it was working at first because it was so quiet we didn't know if it was on but it definitely was working because his boots were nice and dry after a little while
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these for winter especially. He works outside and this drys out his boots very well. It was hard to know it was working at first because it was so quiet we didn't know if it was on but it definitely was working because his boots were nice and dry after a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product to dry construction boots in summer heat.
customer_reviews.text: At first try I thought it was not working as I did not see or hear a blower...it silently heated my sweat soaked construction boots dry in about an hour....VERY VERY HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Polzinski

customer_reviews.title: New to this product so will have little to compare ...
customer_reviews.text: New to this product so will have little to compare. I think because it has just a gentle warmth it will be something I can leave overnight and expect my wet work boots to be dry in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband has used this twice now after working out in ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband has used this twice now after working out in the rain and his boots were soaking wet. It's very quiet, I kept checking to see if it was on. Heavy work boots totally dry in the morning!!!!! He LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: A must have boot dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one of these for my husband several years ago for his work boots and have made a purchase of this item for my son in-law for Christmas. So easy to use and makes your boots dry and toasty to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband that works outside in all weather conditions. In the winter months his boots get wet daily and he was using news paper in them to try and get them dry for the next day. More often then not they were still wet the next day. He has used this boot dryer several times now and LOVES putting on completely DRY boots every morning now!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 0 if I could. It's ultra silent because it doesn't work at all. Unfortunately, I waited too long to try it and now am outside the window of return. I only thing that works on it is the blue light that indicates that it's plugged in. There is no air blowing, much less heat. DON'T waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger M.

customer_reviews.title: ... far it's doing the job it's supposed to and happy with the
customer_reviews.text: This is my second boot dryer and we use them a lot and I have tested this new one I got and so far it's doing the job it's supposed to and happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Jenny F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Anyone who works or hunts outdoors these are great to warm up and dry your boots out.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I thought this boot dryer worked nicely, no issues there. However I just bought it on 01/08/2020 and it has already stopped working completely. I made sure to never put any items on there that were dripping at all and also I haven't moved it around at all to where it could have gotten damaged. Pretty disappointed in the quality I guess. I wouldn't recommend this product for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Schultz

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't buy
customer_reviews.text: got this and thought my inside of my boots would finally be dry but NO it doesn't dry the toe part of the boot and yes I put it together the right way
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works well for ski boots.
customer_reviews.text: No problems and does not take up a lot of floor space. Used to dry ski boots.
customer_reviews.author: Boat School 67

customer_reviews.title: Works! It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I don't love it, but the person I gave it to does. It doesn't feel substantial, but it does the job of drying freshening his work boots. He thought it didn't work at first, but it does. Only negative - no on/off on the thing. He wants another for a different location. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: JeannieB

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: My base wouldn't snap together no matter how hard I tried, but it doesn't seem to affect the way it works. I was disappointed at first, thinking it looked cheap particularly with the problem with the base, but I can't deny it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who lives in cold weather can benefit from one of these!
customer_reviews.text: My husband works outside all winter and this dryer has been great for his work boots. He puts them on it in the evening and by morning they are dry and warm. Very low heat so it doesn't damage leather. The only downside is there is no on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Woodland Wife

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results for the teenagers soccer stank
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results for all shoe types.. should have gotten this year's / seasons ago... would have saved our car, closet ams noses! ;)
customer_reviews.author: A. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: DOA out of the box
customer_reviews.text: To be fair it didn't work right out of the box, but I feel without a fan, it would take a very long time to dry something wet, damp maybe, but wet???
customer_reviews.author: C. Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: If You Work Outdoors, You Need This!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe dryer is awesome!!! I work outdoors and it rains a lot in the summer. When I get home, I plug the boot dryer in and put my shoes on it and go to sleep. They are completely dry and warm by morning. And it's 100% silent! Don't recommend this if you're looking for a fast dryer, though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: So handy I’m considering buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most handy gadget to have. I bought it for my sons football cleats. Since they practice everyday and in any weather it’s hard to get them to dry out before wearing them again. This product did the trick and one pair of cleats lasted the hole season without stinking up our whole house. It snowed recently and we used used it for boots and gloves. I’ve also used it to dry out my dress shoes after I’ve worn them on a rainy day.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: This dryer is the easiest way to safely dry your boots and keep them in good shape that I know of.
customer_reviews.text: I use this dryer at our hunting lodge and I have another one in the garage for my work boots. I just put my boots on the dryer when I get in from hunting or work and the next morning they're warm and dry, ready for another day. It's just as important in the summer, to dry the sweat and keep the boots from starting to smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a dryer exactly like this. It lasted for many years. We don't use the electric, just place it over a heat duct. Warm, dry boots on the morning...priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Worked just a advertised, at where I work I constantly have to deal with damp or wet boots, with this thing, I can leave my boots on the dryer overnight and they're as good as new on the inside when I go to put them on. Very good product, would recommend to someone who's in a very similar situation as me.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I use these all year round to make ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use these all year round to make sure the work boots don't get funky. This one works good, haven't had any problems and I've been using it almost every day for the last few months or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where is the on and off switch?
customer_reviews.text: The description says LED on off switch and I don’t see any switch.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher bratun

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Husband works outside all year round and these are a necessity for dry warm boots at a great price. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: One of the best boot/shoe driers I have owned, sturdy construction. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Mayhood

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe dryer
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very quiet. Has blue light to let you know there is power to the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: super quiet
customer_reviews.text: works well takes awhile to dry but does the job
customer_reviews.author: samantha graham

customer_reviews.title: Silent, safe, and effective
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to do! Works overnight and is silent!
customer_reviews.author: Julesy Sioux

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your toes dry and warm.
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my mom who walks her dogs in winter weather. We have had one for years and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So far great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been working good. Nice it has on and off switch
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job!
customer_reviews.text: Dried my boots perfectly over night. Must airing them out in garage for over 2 weeks didn't work. Front base did not click on very easily as others have noted. Still, a group tool for any hunter!
customer_reviews.author: Yankee Don

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to dry my muk boots after winter days at work. Works well but takes all night to dry
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: TAKES FOREVER
customer_reviews.text: Takes so long to dry never would buy again. Over night still didn’t dry my boots for the next day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, your feet will thank you
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchase i have ever made! Nothing better than warm dry boots in the morning. Lasted about a year but what can you expect for 20 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Marc pariseau

customer_reviews.title: Really Works, Silent
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. Dries big, heavy, boots completely overnight. Is silent and not hot. There isn't any smell from the boots. Highly recommend. Wish I had purchased it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great at drying boots. Wish there was a timer, otherwise awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkette

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for about a month. Have used several times on shoes and boots. Works really well. It’s doesn’t dry them fast. But I’m thinking that’s more designed to dry slow. Boots were soaked and by morning nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Pawelek

customer_reviews.title: Awesone
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. Would be better if there was a way to put a deodorizer in it to help with boot odor. Very easy to use and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials but works great
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it’s a little flimsy and some of the plastic doesn’t fit together perfectly. Works great. Dries any/all footwear I own weather it’s super sweaty or soaking wet. Seems to help with odor my new boots are still pretty fresh after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: William Murphy

customer_reviews.text: Other half says it is a great thing to have. He works for a steel company. He says it drys his boots real good and he even uses it for his sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: Use it every night and my feet love me now.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdogchet

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. His work boots were super wet and this dried them right up. At first it doesn't look like much and it is very very quiet. But leave your boots overnight and you will be happy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Hallmon

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer, not fast, but perfect for overnight drying
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome! Really passive air flow, you don't hardly feel it with your hands, but when you slide those boots on in the morning, you feel that cozy warmth has definitely been flowing all night
customer_reviews.author: Top Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son he love it for his work boots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT product. I have had mine for at least ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT product. I have had mine for at least 20 years. I just bought 4 and gave them to my employees. They will dry soaking wet shoes by morning, every time! Heat is enough to dry things without being so intense as to harm them. Dries boots, shoes, pacs, Sorrels, gloves: anything that fits over the tubes. Heat source is absolutely soundless, and
customer_reviews.author: Dan T.

product_meta.title: JobSite Original Shoe Boot Dryer - Electric Warmer - Deodorizes, Prevents Mold – Ultra Silent
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5.5 x 11.25 x 11.25 inches; 2.6 Pounds
 * Item model number :54091
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :January 8, 2013
 * Manufacturer :Jobsite
 * ASIN :B00AYJKBHE

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #23,324 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #4 inShoe Dryers 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars1,099 ratings
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
WARM THERMAL AIR – Designed to dry your wet boots, shoes, gloves or garments safely overnight with warm thermal air that rises naturally without over drying or shrinking

PREVENTS BACTERIA – Naturally deodorizes and prevents odors caused by perspiration and bacteria while preventing the growth of fungus and mold. Dry time warm-up (30 mins); damp (8 hours); wet (overnight)
SILENT DRY - Safe, Silent, Simple, no motor or moving parts, so quiet you might think it is not actually working, when it is

MULTI PURPOSE - The sturdy base allows you to use this dryer with all types of winter boots, work boots, rain boots, tennis shoes, ski boot liners, gloves, hats and accessories safely without over drying
TRUSTED BRAND - Includes a 2 Year Warranty
